channel.title: Mohammad Habib - Senior Full Stack Developer
channel.description: Stay updated with Mohammad Habib's latest projects, technical insights, and professional achievements in full-stack development, team leadership, and enterprise solutions.

image.title: Mohammad Habib - Senior Full Stack Developer

item.title: Portfolio Website Launch - Enhanced SEO & Performance
item.description: Launched comprehensive portfolio website showcasing 7+ years of full-stack development experience with enhanced SEO optimization, modern responsive design, and complete project showcase.
item.content:encoded:
I'm excited to announce the launch of my enhanced portfolio website featuring:

  • Complete SEO Suite: Comprehensive sitemap, robots.txt, RSS feed, and structured data
  • Modern Design: Responsive layout with advanced CSS animations and Tailwind CSS
  • Project Showcase: Detailed presentation of enterprise solutions and real-time applications
  • Performance Optimized: Fast loading times and mobile-first approach
  • Contact Integration: Direct communication channels for collaboration opportunities

Visit the website to explore my expertise in PHP Laravel, Node.js, React, Vue.js, and enterprise solution development.
item.author: mohamedhabibwork@gmail.com (Mohammad Habib)

item.title: Skills & Technologies - Full Stack Excellence
item.description: Comprehensive overview of technical expertise spanning PHP Laravel, Node.js, React, Vue.js, GoLang, Python, and modern development practices with 7+ years of professional experience.
item.content:encoded:
My technical expertise covers the full spectrum of modern web development:

Backend Technologies:

  • PHP & Laravel: Advanced enterprise solutions, API development, and payment integrations
  • Node.js: Real-time applications, microservices, and scalable backend systems
  • GoLang: High-performance applications and concurrent systems
  • Python: Data processing, automation, and AI/ML integration

Frontend Technologies:

  • React: Modern SPAs, state management, and component architecture
  • Vue.js: Progressive web applications and reactive interfaces
  • JavaScript/TypeScript: ES6+, async programming, and type safety

Databases & Cloud:

  • Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
  • Cloud Platforms: AWS, DigitalOcean, containerization
  • DevOps: CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and deployment automation
item.author: mohamedhabibwork@gmail.com (Mohammad Habib)

item.title: Featured Projects - Enterprise Solutions & Innovation
item.description: Showcase of key projects including transportation management systems, healthcare platforms, fintech solutions, and real-time applications built with modern technologies and best practices.
item.content:encoded:
Explore my portfolio of enterprise-grade projects that demonstrate expertise in:

  • Transportation Systems: Comprehensive ride-hailing and logistics platforms
  • Healthcare Solutions: Patient management and medical data systems
  • Fintech Applications: Payment processing and financial management tools
  • Real-time Systems: Live tracking, notifications, and collaborative platforms
  • E-commerce Platforms: Scalable online marketplaces and inventory management

Each project showcases modern development practices, scalable architecture, and user-centric design principles.
item.author: mohamedhabibwork@gmail.com (Mohammad Habib)

item.title: Professional Experience - Leadership & Technical Excellence
item.description: Comprehensive overview of 7+ years professional journey as Senior Full Stack Developer and Team Leader, highlighting key achievements in enterprise software development and team management.
item.content:encoded:
My professional journey spans diverse industries and challenging technical projects:

Leadership Experience:

  • Team Leadership: Led cross-functional development teams of 5-12 members
  • Project Management: Delivered 20+ enterprise-grade applications on time and within budget
  • Mentoring: Guided junior developers and established coding standards

Technical Achievements:

  • System Architecture: Designed scalable, maintainable software architectures
  • Performance Optimization: Improved application performance by up to 300%
  • Integration Expertise: Successfully integrated complex payment gateways and APIs

Industry Impact:

  • Transportation: Built ride-hailing platforms serving thousands of users
  • Healthcare: Developed HIPAA-compliant patient management systems
  • Fintech: Implemented secure payment processing solutions
item.author: mohamedhabibwork@gmail.com (Mohammad Habib)
